summary.para: The namespace contains channels that use the TCP protocol to transport messages and objects to and from remote locations. By default, the TCP channels encode objects and method calls in binary format for transmission, but other encoding and decoding formatter sinks can be specified in the configuration properties of a channel. One of the most important classes of the namespace is the class.

remarks.para: The class combines the class and the class, and can be used to both receive and send messages using the TCP protocol.
